div.head: choice and the Janus-Faced elements
div.p: choice is commonly used to group a pair of the so-called Janus-Faced elements, e.g., orig & reg, abbr & expan, or sic & corr.
The default behavior of TEI Boilerplate is to display both items in the the choice, with the second item enclosed in parentheses.

For instance:
The TEIText Encoding Initiative Guidelines may be used to encode a wide vareityvariety of document types and genres.
